As part of the action used to cast this power, you must make a melee weapon attack against one creature within your reach, otherwise the power fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and if you were hidden from it, it takes an additional [[/r 1d4]] poison damage.

This power's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra [[/r 1d8]] poison damage to the target, and the damage the target takes when you are hidden from it increases to [[/r 2d4]]. Both damage rolls increase by [[/r 1d8]] and [[/r 1d4]], respectively, at 11th level and 17th level.
